vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a new Specific Use Permit to allow a group residential facility on property zoned Subdistrict FWMU-3 within Planned Development District No. 595, the South Dallas/Fair Park Special Purpose District, on the southeast line of Park Row Avenue, northeast of Colonial Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z-25-000075

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
